header.description: The Groovy plugin is an automation based plugin. It is run during the deployment to execute user defined Groovy scripts.

property-ui.label: Script
property-ui.description: Enter the script code to execute. A java.util.Properties variable for output properties to upload to the server is in the context called outProps and another containing all the input properties will be attached called inProps
